interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: NeoCell Overnighter Collagen, 9.3oz
Review Date: 2021/04/10
Store: NeoCell
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'NeoCell', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin c,zinc', 'Unit Count': '9.3 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.55 x 5.08 x 3.46 inches; 9.3 Ounces', 'UPC': '016185130623'}
Review Text: I have been taking this for 2 weeks nightly now and I can tell the difference in my skin and hair feeling softer. I have sores on my arm and they have been healing faster.My skin feel smoother and less breakouts and my fingernails are starting to lose the ridges on them and look so much stronger. For the restful sleep benefit, I didn't feel any difference as I don't have sleep problem.
Review Title: One hour before bedtime ritual drink.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Electric Shaver for Men, SOOCAS Mens Electric Razor, Wet & Dry IPX7 Waterproof Rotary Facial Shaver, Portable Face Shaver Cordless Travel USB Rechargeable for Husband Dad, Black SOOCAS {'Brand': 'SOOCAS', 'Special Feature': 'Portable,Rechargeable,Cordless,Waterproof,Compact', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Included Components': 'Charger', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Package Dimensions': '7.36 x 4.21 x 2.68 inches; 11.18 Ounces', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)', 'Manufacturer': 'SOOCAS'} i'm surprise about the quality of this shaver, for most part it cuts really well and smooth.
the design is compact and not that heavy on hand, the battery last quite long, and i like the USB-C charging so i can use 1 charging for all. the battery last long enough.
over all this shaver is affordable and great purchase Good inexpensive shaver Reusable Makeup Remover Pads| Dual- Texture Soft Reusable Face Microfiber Rounds For Mascara, Eye Shadow, Lipstick, Foundation (3 Pads+ Makeup Headband +Laundry Bag) TECHEALTH {'Product Dimensions': '11 x 7.5 x 2 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '860002480299'} The pads really soft and there's another side textured pads for "physical exfoliation" skin. It really removes all the makeup. really works removing makeup and have duo sides. Kneipp Shower Foam Goodbye Stress Water Mint & Rosemary 6.81 Oz Kneipp {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Kneipp', 'Scent': 'Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 2.5 x 2.5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'} I really enjoyed this soap. The scent is so good, its so practical change from gel to foam. I guess I used it too much for the first time, I only need 1 pump and spread it with loofah and that's enough for the whole body. The scent is so good, really practical change from gel to foam. 24K Gold Under Eye Mask– 20 Pairs- Under Eye Patches with Face Massager Roller, Anti-Aging Hyaluronic Acid Collagen Eye Masks for Dark Circles and Puffiness Dark Under Eyes Treatment FRLEDM {'Brand': 'FRLEDM', 'Special Feature': 'Anti Aging', 'Unit Count': '21.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '40', 'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 7 x 1.5 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'Batteries': '1 AA batteries required. (included)'} I don't really interested in face roller but I feel the eye masks really worth it and decrease puffiness. Especially after put it in the fridge. Eye masks really worth it, face roller not so much. Avajar Whitening A-Solution Mask 10 Pack - Hydrating Face Masks | Moisturizing Face Mask| Korean Face Mask Sheets Pack a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar {'Brand': 'a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Skin Whitening', 'Scent': 'Hydrating', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Dimensions': '5.28 x 1.57 x 6.89 inches; 11.99 Ounces'} After I took off the mask 20 mins, skin really bright, soft, and moisturizing! It is sticky though so I have to rinse it with water and put night cream after. But it's so worth it. Really brightening and moisturizing. WIS Acne Skin Pleiotropic Conditioning Face Mask Acne Scar Remover & zit Treatment & Blemish Fightting & Reduce Pores | Organic Mask Care Acne Prone skin-24 Pcs +WIS+ {'Brand': '+WIS+', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.07 x 4.61 x 3.66 inches; 1.83 Pounds'} So far, it doesn't make me breakout. Moisturizing yet powerful ingredients for acne prone skin. NeoCell Overnighter Collagen, 9.3oz NeoCell {'Brand': 'NeoCell', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin c,zinc', 'Unit Count': '9.3 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.55 x 5.08 x 3.46 inches; 9.3 Ounces', 'UPC': '016185130623'} I have been taking this for 2 weeks nightly now and I can tell the difference in my skin and hair feeling softer. I have sores on my arm and they have been healing faster.My skin feel smoother and less breakouts and my fingernails are starting to lose the ridges on them and look so much stronger. For the restful sleep benefit, I didn't feel any difference as I don't have sleep problem. One hour before bedtime ritual drink.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Preference for Quality and Performance:** The user places a high premium on effective grooming and beauty products, focusing specifically on solutions for skin hydration, brightness, and acne prevention.

- **Compact and Portable Design:** The individual prioritizes lightweight and transportable items, ideal for both home use and travel, ensuring convenience in their daily routine.

- **Rechargeable and Versatile Charging Options:** A preference for modern, rechargeable products with USB-C capabilities reflects the user's commitment to multifunctionality and ease of use.

- **Affordability:** The user consistently seeks effective yet budget-friendly options, demonstrating a focus on achieving good value across various product categories.

- **Waterproof Features:** Plasticity and practicality are essential to the user, as evidenced by their appreciation for waterproof grooming tools.

- **Soft and Exfoliating Properties:** Sensory experiences matter to the user, who favors formulations with soft and dual-texture materials for versatile application.

- **Scented Experiences:** The enjoyment of appealing scents enhances the user’s grooming rituals, contributing positively to their overall experience.

- **Targeted Solutions:** Actively seeking products that specifically address skin issues—particularly acne and related concerns—illustrates the user's focus on visible results and effective treatment paths.

Recent interactions emphasize the user's commitment to improving skin health through targeted solutions, particularly those promoting smoother skin and stronger nails. Their experience with supplements indicates an interest in holistic approaches for overall skin wellness, further reinforcing the preference for quality, performance, and convenience in their grooming practices.
